Looks like the problem stems from the fact that SWT has run out of handles. 
Moving to SWT where similar bugs are filed.
marking as RC4 as I am looking into it.

deferring to 3.1.  I can not recreate the exception ,but we still need to work 
on any GDI handle leaking

Gilles, can you provide more information about what you are doing when this 
happens, what editors and views you are using etc..?

Have not heard from bug creator in 4 weeks.  Closing, please re-open if you have
re-creatable steps.
